verses.text:
Come, feed thy sheep that on the moun-tain high Are wan-der-ing hungry, faint and lone-ly too;
And some have wan-dered from thy courts so nigh, With none to speak the soul-re-fresh-ing word to them of you.

Some souls are hun-gry, wait-ing for the bread That com-eth down from heav-en's courts a-bove,
And some are faint and wea-ry, sick and sad, Still wait-ing for the heal-ing touch of thy re-deem-ing love.

Then let us haste to feed thy hun-gry sheep, And bring them back in-to the fold of love,
For thou hast said that thou wilt safe-ly keep All those who trust in thee, and look to thee a-bove.
